local_intent: Perceive white_plate (detect or scan), execute ApproachAndAlign with 0.005 tolerance, compute grasp pose, pick using computed grasp, verify ObjectInGripper.
assumptions: Robot is homed and can move to approach poses
White plate is within sensor range or recoverable via scan
Gripper is open and operational before grasp
coherence_with_global: Subtree follows the global sequence: perception (detect/scan), precise approach and alignment (active leaf), compute grasp, pick, and verify object in gripper; matches GLOBAL_BT nodes and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION intent.
